meta_info.name: DV_QUANTIFIED
meta_info.description: Abstract class defining the concept of true quantified values, i.e. values which are not only ordered, but which have a precise magnitude.

functions.name: valid_magnitude_status
functions.meaning: Test whether a string value is one of the valid values for the magnitude_status attribute.

functions.name: accuracy_unknown
functions.meaning: True if accuracy is not known, e.g. due to not being recorded or discernable.

functions.name: is_equal
functions.meaning: Return True if this `DV_QUANTIFIED` is considered equal to `_other_`.

functions.name: less_than
functions.meaning: True if this Quantified object is less than `_other_`, based on comparison of `_magnitude_`.

attributes.name: magnitude_status
attributes.description: Optional status of magnitude with values:

attributes.name: accuracy
attributes.description: Accuracy of measurement. Exact form of expression determined in descendants.
